value.msg: The server group policy is not supported
boot device size is not valid or missing
request body has an error: doesn't match schema: Error at "/name": value must be a string

InternalServerError.description: Internal Server Error, returns a 500 if something is broken on IaaS API Side.

Unauthorized.description: A request which was not authorized.

v1Area.description: The basic properties of a network area.

v1AreaDefaultPrefixLengthIPv4.description: The default prefix length for networks in the network area.

v1AreaMaxPrefixLengthIPv4.description: The maximal prefix length for networks in the network area.

v1AreaMinPrefixLengthIPv4.description: The minimal prefix length for networks in the network area.

v1AreaPrefixConfigIPv4.description: The IPv4 prefix config for a network area.

v1CreateAreaAddressFamily.description: The addressFamily object for a area create request.

v1CreateAreaIPv4.description: The config object for a IPv4 network area.

v1CreateNetworkAddressFamily.description: The addressFamily object for a network create request.

v1CreateNetworkIPv4.description: The config object for a IPv4 network.

v1CreateNetworkIPv6.description: The config object for a IPv6 network.

v1Error.description: Error with HTTP error code and an error message.

v1GenericName.description: The name for a General Object. Matches Names and also UUIDs.

v1IP.description: Object that represents an IPv4 address.

v1IPv6.description: Object that represents an IPv6 address.

v1Nameserver.description: A list containing DNS Servers/Nameservers for IPv4.

v1Nameserverv6.description: A list containing DNS Servers/Nameservers for IPv6.

v1NetworkArea.description: Object that represents a network area.

v1NetworkAreaIPv4.description: The IPv4 properties of a network area.

v1NetworkRange.description: Object that represents a network range.

v1ProjectCount.description: The amount of projects currently referencing a specific area.

v1ResourceState.description: The state of a resource object.

v1UpdateAreaAddressFamily.description: The addressFamily object for a area update request.

v1UpdateAreaIPv4.description: The update object for a IPv4 network area.

v1UpdateNetworkAddressFamily.description: The addressFamily object for a network update request.

v1UpdateNetworkIPv4.description: The config object for a IPv4 network update.

v1UpdateNetworkIPv6.description: The config object for a IPv6 network update.

info.description: This API allows you to create and modify IaaS resources.
info.title: IaaS-API

get.description: Get a list of all visible network areas defined in an organization.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

200.description: Get a list of all network areas.

get.summary: List all network areas in an organization.

post.description: Create a new network area in an organization.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

post.summary: Create new network area in an organization.

delete.description: Delete an existing network area in an organization. This is only possible if no projects are using the area anymore.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

202.description: Delete request for area has been accepted.

example.msg: Areas must no longer be referenced by any project to be deleted

409.description: Tried to delete an area that was still in use by a project.

get.description: Get details about a network area in an organization.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

get.summary: Get details about a network area.

patch.description: Update the settings of a network area in an organization.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

get.description: Get a list of all network ranges in a network area.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

get.summary: List all network ranges in a network area.

post.description: Create a new network range in an existing network area.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

requestBody.description: Request an addition of network ranges to an area.

example.msg: Network ranges must not overlap with other network ranges or transfer networks

409.description: Tried to add a network range that conflicts with an existing network range or transfer range.

post.summary: Create new network range in a network area.

delete.description: Delete a network range of a network area. The deletion will fail if the network range is still used.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Range.
parameters.name: networkRangeId

202.description: Delete request for network range has been accepted.

example.msg: Network ranges must no longer be used to be deleted

409.description: Tried to delete a network range that is still in use.

get.description: Get details about a network range in a network area.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Range.
parameters.name: networkRangeId

get.summary: Get details about a network range.

get.description: Get a list of all projects using a network area.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

200.description: List projects for a network area.

get.summary: List all projects using a network area.

get.description: Get a list of all network routes defined in a network area.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

get.summary: List all network routes in a network area.

post.description: Create one or several new network routes in a network area.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

requestBody.description: Request an addition of routes to an area.

202.description: Create request for network routes has been accepted.

example.msg: routes must not overlap with other network ranges or transfer networks

409.description: Tried to add a route that conflicts with an existing network range or transfer range.

delete.description: Delete a network route of a network area.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Route.
parameters.name: routeId

202.description: Delete request for network route has been accepted.

get.description: Get details about a network route defined in a network area.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
parameters.name: areaId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Route.
parameters.name: routeId

get.summary: Get details about a network route.

get.description: Get a list of all networks inside a project.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Project.
parameters.name: projectId

200.description: List all networks of a project.

get.summary: List all networks inside a project.

post.description: Create a new network in a project. `nameservers` will be filled from `defaultNameservers` of the respective area if not specified. If the project has `internetAccess` enabled and this is the first network in the project this might incur cost.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Project.
parameters.name: projectId

example.msg: Can not allocate prefixes for network. Ensure the area has sufficient space in the configured network ranges

409.description: Can not allocate prefixes for network.

delete.description: Delete a network. If the network is still in use, the deletion will fail.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Project.
parameters.name: projectId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network.
parameters.name: networkId

202.description: Delete request for network has been accepted.

example.msg: Can not delete network. It is still has systems connected to it.

409.description: Can not delete network that is still in use.

get.description: Get details about a network of a project.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Project.
parameters.name: projectId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network.
parameters.name: networkId

patch.description: Update the settings of a network inside a project.

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Project.
parameters.name: projectId

parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network.
parameters.name: networkId

requestBody.description: Request an update of a network.
